INSERT INTO sc_event (evt_code, user_uuid, group_uuid, comp_uuid, flow_uuid, metadata, timestamp) VALUES (?, ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, NOW());
INSERT INTO sc_rights (rights_hash, text) VALUES (?, ?);
SELECT text FROM sc_rights WHERE rights_hash = ?;
INSERT INTO sc_component (comp_uuid, comp_hash, name, creator, rights_hash, creation_date, firing_policy, mode, format, runnable, res_location, uri) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT comp_uuid, comp_hash, name, creator, rights_hash FROM sc_component WHERE uri = ? ORDER BY comp_ver_id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sc_component WHERE comp_uuid = ?;
INSERT INTO sc_flow (uuid, version, upload_date) VALUES (?, ?, NOW());
